name: Escape the Underground (itch)
description:
You are Frederick, a little guy who eats blocks and rocks for a living, and unfortunately you're sent to hell. No one knows why...

Anyway, your task is to try and escape, away from hell, and back to your previous life. The evil spirits want you dead, every 10 seconds. If you don't satisfy them, you will be destroyed and return to the last place you stood.

Just keep in mind, you can hardly see anything, and you're in a rush. Good luck!

Controls:

Mouse controls all menus, unless stated otherwise

Arrow Keys / WASD / ZQSD / Controller dpad - Movement

If using a controller, press 'A' button to jump.

Confirmed working with Xbox 360 controller

To login and submit highscores, you need a Game Jolt account, and you can get one here.
